message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with online learning and prediction with expert advice, which are topics commonly studied in the machine learning community. The focus on collaboration and the presence of malicious users suggests that the paper may belong to the sub-category of collaborative learning (cs.LG), while the use of optimization techniques and the consideration of different experts for different users suggests that it may also belong to the sub-categories of optimization (cs.DS, cs.IT) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the mention of data sharing and the desire to amortize regret across a community of users suggests that the paper may also belong to the sub-category of social and information networks (cs.SI).
